text: LetL = ({w € {a,b}", #(a) = #(0)}) Clearly, L is not regular, But the question is Not asking about L, But asking about middle(L) middle ({w € {a,b}*, #(a) = #(b)}) = =*, So Regular. NOTE that, Every string w can be surrounded by some strings ¥, z to make ywz € L, So, every string w € middle(L). For example, take w = abb, now, take y =€, z = a, and we have ywz € L, So, abb € middle(L).
